divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard.I was looking for any satellites.I thought this was super weird.These object move in the sky with me it is very very strange they are there any night there are no clouds it is the most strange thing I think anyone has ever seen.I stay away from almost everyone I am very scared.i lost sight of the object when i finally fell asleap
